CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 7, 1964, pg. 6 reads:"Hilton Crowded for Brotherhood Food Festival - Second Prize - The Lucy Stone Civic League repeated last year's feat by again winning second prize with its table of colorful and tasty salads. Serving guests were Mmes. Susan Patterson, Pearl Anderson, Isabel Hawkins, Ruth Hawkins, Alberta Mason, Geneva Medley, chairman, and Anna Garrett."
TitMainTitle: Group of members of the Lucy Stone Civic League, including Susan Patterson, Pearl Anderson, Isabel Hawkins, Ruth Hawkins, Alberta Mason, Geneve Medley, and Anna Garrett, standing behind rectangular banquet table with drinks and desserts, in Hilton Hotel for Brotherhood Food Festival
